CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI looks at the toys and then sits on MOT's lap on the floor
MOT looks at CHI and gestures towards the toys
CHI gets off of MOTs lap and picks up the toy duck
MOT moves around to face CHI and looks at the duck
CHI has his back to the camera
MOT stares at CHI and the object CHI holds
CHI still has his back to the camera
MOT makes kisses as she moves towards CHI
CHI avoids MOT by moving over to the toys
CHI looks at the book and the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box before CHI
MOT makes squeezing motion with hand
<bef> MOT looks down at the book on the floor
CHI bends over the car on the floor
CHI tries to fit the duck into the car
MOT puts the car in front of CHI
CHI puts the duck on top of the car
the duck falls off of the car
the duck fell off the toy car
CHI watches MOT playing with the toy
MOT rolls the car across the floor
CHI rolls the car back to where it was .<aft> CHI squeezes duck
CHI looks up to see what MOT is doing and glances at the desk briefly
CHI looks up at the toy boxes
<1-10> MOT looks at the activity boxes . <4- 7> MOT points to the boxes
MOT leans over and focusses on the book on the floor
MOT pulls the book over to look at
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
MOT points to the picture and looks at CHI
MOT points to the picture of ice cream
<$=1> MOT pulls back and looks at CHI
CHI points to the football next to MOT
CHI puts the toy duck on the car
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT catches the ball and throws it back to CHI
CHI is reaching for the ball
<aft> CHI picks up the ball and throws it to MOT
MOT throws the ball to CHI
the ball MOT throws hit CHI`s leg
CHI picks up the ball . <aft> CHI tries to throw ball but it rolls away
CHI picks up the ball and throws it to MOT
MOT throws the ball up into the air several times
CHI watches MOT throw the ball up in the air
CHI points to the picture up on the wall
MOT looks up at the picture
<bef> CHI turns around and looks at the chair behind him
CHI touches the cushion of the chair
CHI points to the pandas on the chair
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box steady for CHI
MOT grabs the jack+in+the+box to hold it
MOT moves the clown around in the box
CHI puts his finger in the clown's eye and examines the clowns head and eyes
MOT watches CHI play with the clown

INV enters the room at 09:42:14 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 09:49:00 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the beads to play with
INV puts the other toys away
INV puts object on the table and sets it into motion
MOT moves very close to CHI
CHI stares at the object but seems confused
<aft> CHI looks up at the object
INV is about to put the object in the drawer but lets CHI touch the object first
INV holds the object together so CHI can touch it
CHI touches the baubles on the object
INV tells MOT about the parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from the Small Scale Activity and CHI stands near MOT at the desk
both MOT and CHI are not in camera view
MOT stands over CHI holding the box
<bef> CHI walks over to the stool . CHI sits on a stool
MOT tips the ball out of the box
CHI runs to pick up the ball and tries to throw the ball into the box MOT is holding
the ball misses and bounces off of the floor
MOT lowers the box to CHI level
MOT holds out the box for CHI
CHI runs towards the box holding the ball
CHI throws the ball into the box
MOT tips the box and drops the ball out
MOT walks over to the corner
MOT stands in one corner holding the box
CHI throws the ball but only hits the box
CHI picks up the ball and throws it
MOT tries to catch the ball with the box but CHI misses again
CHI throws the ball again and misses
MOT waits for CHI to try again
CHI tries to get the ball in again but misses
MOT tries to get the ball in the box but cannot
CHI throws the ball into the box
MOT throws the ball down to CHI
CHI throws the ball half-heartedly and misses the box
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI picks up the ball and rolls it into the box
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI catches the ball and falls down
CHI points to the ball which is off screen
CHI reaches forward to get the ball but pulls back
CHI gets the ball and holds it
CHI gets up and throws the ball but not far enough
CHI picks the ball up and throws it again but behind him
MOT holds the box and waits
CHI throws the ball again but it goes to the side
MOT puts the box in front of the rolling ball and helps it into the box
CHI runs over to the box picks it up into the air and drops the ball out
CHI swings the box up into the air and throws it behind his head
CHI goes over to the box and bends one side in
MOT takes CHI hands from the box
MOT gives CHI the ball and then holds the box out in front of CHI
CHI throws the ball and misses the box
MOT gives CHI the ball and walks over near the door
CHI runs over to the box and puts the ball into it
CHI picks up the box and holds it over his head so that the ball drops on his head . <aft> CHI throws the box towards MOT
<$=1> MOT kneels down next to the box
CHI holds the ball and watches MOT
<4-7> MOT moves the box over on the floor
CHI holds onto the ball and moves away from MOT
CHI throws the ball up in the air
MOT catches the ball and throws it back to CHI
CHI throws the ball behind him and then picks it up and throws it again
the ball goes over near MOT and bounces off of the box
MOT lets the ball roll on the floor as she bends to tie CHI's shoe
CHI rocks backwards and then stands and lets MOT tie his shoe
MOT holds the ball up in front of CHI
CHI tries to take the ball from MOT
MOT holds the ball up above CHI's head
CHI grabs the ball and walks away from MOT
MOT holds the box out in front of CHI
CHI throws the ball into the box
MOT holds the box up and catches the ball with box
MOT comes over to the table with the boxes
MOT sits on the floor with peekaboo box and starts to remove the cover
CHI comes over to MOT and sits on the floor
MOT puts the box in front of CHI
CHI removes the cover of the box
CHI points to the towel and looks up at MOT
MOT looks at CHI with open arms
CHI examines the lid of the box . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
MOT peeks at CHI from behind the towel
CHI starts to get up off the floor
MOT is still under the towel
CHI stands and looks at MOT
MOT removes the towel and then tries to put on CHI
MOT hugs CHI and pats him on the back
CHI sleepily lets MOT hold him
MOT covers CHI with the towel
CHI gets up and walks out of camera view
MOT signs with her finger for CHI to come as she watches him
MOT holds the towel out for CHI to see
MOT ties the towel around CHI's shoulders
CHI drops the towel on the floor
MOT stands next to the table with the boxes
CHI puts the towel in the box
<aft> MOT walks over and puts the top on the box
CHI goes over to the desk and out of camera view
MOT comes over to the desk and puts the other box away
MOT takes down the next box from the desk and sits on the floor with it
CHI sits down on a stool near MOT
MOT removes the cover of the box
CHI leans forward and looks into the box
CHI reaches into the box and picks up a crayon
CHI has his back to the camera
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI holds up a crayon and looks at MOT
MOT points to the paper in the box
CHI starts to draw and then stops and lays next to the box
MOT reaches in box and moves paper
MOT takes out a sheet of paper and crayon
CHI takes a crayon out of the box and holds it
MOT puts the lid on the box
MOT puts the paper on the lid of the box and picks up a crayon
MOT looks up at CHI as she holds the crayon all ready to draw
CHI leans back and looks up at MOT
MOT draws heavily on the paper making a strange noise
CHI throws one of his crayons on the floor
<bef> MOT turns her self around and draws a dark line on both sides of the paper
CHI looks up at MOT and smiles mischievously
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI lazily puts the paper back on the box and then sits up and watches MOT
<bef> MOT draws heavily on the paper
MOT starts to draw very heavy lines
after each line she draws MOT looks up at CHI
MOT picks up the broken pieces of crayon
MOT holds up the broken crayon and looks at CHI
<bef> MOT holds the pieces of crayon together
<$=1> MOT puts the broken crayon inside the box
MOT picks up another crayon that was on the floor
CHI tries to break the crayon
CHI starts to climb restlessly on the box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI wanders over to the table and then to the door
CHI hangs on to the door knob
<7-11> MOT looks at CHI and holds up one finger
CHI looks at MOT and lets go of door knob
MOT takes down the last box
MOT pulls out a chair from the table and moves it next to CHI
CHI looks at the book in the box
MOT holds out the box containing the book
MOT puts the empty box down on the floor and sits in the chair next to CHI
CHI turns away from MOT as he examines the book
CHI turns a few pages in the book and accidentally drops the book
CHI picks up the book and starts to look through it
MOT tries to help CHI with book
<aft> CHI throws the book into the waste basket
<aft> CHI looks up at MOT smiling
MOT points to the trash barrel
MOT takes the book out of the waste basket and picks up CHI
CHI raises his arm to stroke MOT's chin
CHI drops his arm to rest on MOT's arm as he looks at the book
CHI points to the picture in the book
MOT points to the picture . MOT looks at CHI
MOT gets up and walks over to the desk
CHI drops the book into the box and follows MOT to the desk
CHI hops up and down and smiles
MOT holds the box with the ball in it
MOT throws the ball to CHI
the ball bounces on the floor
CHI watches MOT and holds the ball
MOT puts the box on the chair
CHI throws the ball into the box
CHI picks up the box and tips the ball out on his head and then throws the box onto MOT's foot
MOT moves the box away and sits on the floor holding out her arms to catch the ball
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT bounces the ball in front of CHI
MOT rolls the ball over to CHI
CHI runs and gets the ball
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
< .1-1> MOT throws the ball up into the air
